name: Indie War Hawk
description:
Have you ever wanted to make a difference?

Do you yearn for the fiery aftermath of screeching Missiles?

Does the rattle of Mini Gun Fire get your blood pumping?

War Hawk is a 3D arcade air combat shoot-em-up, in which you pilot a state of the art fighter jet to protect and safeguard those in need.

* You must learn and master your aircraft and its systems to eliminate your enemies.

* You will engage your enemy in close quarter dogfights and wide open aerial sieges.

* You need to think quickly, decisively and critically is order to stay alive.

* You will upgrade your ship as you see fit before each encounter.

You have to succeed, or others will perish!

______________________________________________________________

Controls can be found in the settings menu in the title screen as well as the pause menu in game. You have the option of using Mouse and Keyboard OR joystick(Xbox 360).

There is also an option to invert your pitch in both control menu's.

I've included an easy and hard mode, both sharing the same story line but with differing enemy characteristics.

You have my apologies for any bugs encountered. This game has been a work in progress since May 2016. New builds will be posted throughout the development of this game. So keep an eye on this page!

*Note: Development paused. Demo includes two levels only. Additional levels will become available when development begins again in Spring 2017.

Please, if you find the time, report any bugs in the comments field below.

Many thanks to all how give this demo a try. You comments, suggestions and feedback is very much welcome and appreciated...
